exception.name: ErrorLockTransactionLoggingFailed
exception.description: This exception is thrown by the SE API method lockTransactionLogging when locking of the transaction logging functionality fails.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorLockTransactionLoggingFailed that is thrown by the SE API method lockTransactionLogging when locking of the transaction logging functionality fails.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when transaction logging lock operation fails
